channel.title: Posts on Pat :: A modern Winlink client
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Pat :: A modern Winlink client

item.title: Winlink anywhere
item.description: Pat is a cross platform Winlink client written in Go. Run it on any modern operating system, including Linux, macOS and Windows.

item.title: Simple, yet powerful
item.description: People have different preferences on how to interact with an application. Pat provides both a modern GUI and a powerful command-line interface, so most users should feel at home.

item.title: Open and free
item.description: Amateur radio is all about experimenting and sharing knowledge. We need to carry forward these traditions when we explore the possibilities of digital communications. Pat is open source and free.
